definition: to offer condolences/to console the bereaved
a string of 100 cash (arch.)/to lament/to condole with/variant of 吊[diao4]

sentences.english: I want you to know how deeply I sympathize with you in your bereavement.
sentences.chinese: 我要你知道，我對你的悲痛致上深切的弔慰。

sentences.english: It was the third time that Roh has offered condolences since Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 這是週二以來盧武鉉第三次發表弔慰之辭。

sentences.english: My wife and I are all thinking of you and sympathizing in your grief.
sentences.chinese: 內人和我都在惦念你，並對你悲痛致上弔慰。

sentences.english: Our condolences go to his wife and family.
sentences.chinese: 向他的妻子和家人謹致弔慰之意。
